entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
